code: @Override public Processor createProcessor(RouteContext routeContext) throws Exception {     if (definition.getTypeClass() == null && definition.getType() != null) {         definition.setTypeClass(routeContext.getCamelContext().getClassResolver().resolveMandatoryClass(definition.getType())).     }     // validate charset     if (definition.getCharset() != null) {         validateCharset(definition.getCharset()).     }     return new ConvertBodyProcessor(definition.getTypeClass(), definition.getCharset()). }

public static void validateCharset(String charset) throws UnsupportedCharsetException {     if (charset != null) {         if (Charset.isSupported(charset)) {             Charset.forName(charset).             return.         }     }     throw new UnsupportedCharsetException(charset). }
